description: Europe's worst-hit country reports a rise of 25% in a day, as the virus spreads fast outside China.
title: Coronavirus cases surge to 400 in Italy
title_page: Coronavirus cases surge to 400 in Italy - BBC News
maintext: On the face of it, this seems like bad news. But there are positives too. China appears to be getting on top of the virus with the number of new cases each day reducing.
